product_name: Nestle NESTEA Instant Iced Tea Lemon 400g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: I  first came to know abt this product at reliance fresh mall, they were giving free sample to taste, along with free sipper and 50 % off if purchased.I instantly liked the product and just purchased if so i don miss the deal too.The ice tea rich in vitamin c which is really good, preparing is really simple, take appropriate amt of water and the tea powder shake it very well and there it is ready to serve.Since i received a sipper/shaker mixing was very well. Tea taste very well when its really chilled. Every chilled sip will give a soothing effect  and refresh the body .My 5 yr old kid also liked it too much since its rich in vitamin c its good for kids also in small amount. Even guest or party and occassion this drink will fit in.Since amazon was giving free 1+1  i instantly bought the product. sipper was not provided , but i did not needed one coz i already had one.already finished the product, waiting for sme offer and will surely buy its again and again.Small size packs also avaliable. For first time users try small pack and than believe me you will buy bigger pack after use.
I've tried quite a few ice teas, but I've liked Nestea the best. It tastes really good.

reviews.review_title: Great taste and super easy to make
reviews.review_body: Can be used for making both hot or cold lemon tea.Just add one teaspoon of this into 1 cup of hot water(or cold),and it's ready.Best for hostel students having a kettle or those who have access to water cooler.

reviews.review_title: Addicted to it. 82/- for one packet.
reviews.review_body: The minimum quantity to buy them was 2, and I was getting two at 50% off so I bought them from cloudtail India. Best. Decision. Ever. Although the packet asks to put 1 tablespoon in 150 ml glass, I usually put 2 and a half spoons to make it more sweet. If you put 1 tablespoon, it may taste a little sour so decide the number of tablespoons according to your taste.(NOTE: ITS NOT WORTH IT TO PAY MORE THAN 120 FOR A PACKET. MAKE SURE YOU DON'T PAY EXTRA DELIVERY FEES)

The product is awesome, chilled it gives a lovely tea flavored boost but there isn't much caffeine in it. As long as the products on sale it's good to buy it but as soon as it crosses the Rs.110/120 mark it starts to become worthless. Free sipper notwithstanding Coke's Georgia brand and Wakri as well as Liston are offering iced teas at a lesser price with similar taste and Sku's(stock keeping units). Wise up your strategy Nestle or this may become a another market you guys get kicked out of!

reviews.review_title: Old packet is good & test quality is very good
reviews.review_body: Product quality chang & test is very different, old packing is good & test quality is very good, new product is not good.... ðŸ¤™ðŸ‘Ž
I am using Nestea for the last two to three years. Since then teste has changed a little bit but still it is very refreshing. I with my family and guests enjoy its awesome flavour off and on.

reviews.review_title: The item tasted strange. When I received the packet ...
reviews.review_body: The item tasted strange. When I received the packet was completely deaerated. I generally buy Nestea from local shops and probably that's what I am going to do from now on. Over all, the item was not worth the money.

reviews.review_title: Amazon sigue siendo una empresa segura y sus artÃ­culos son muy confiables.
